title: GoLow Golf - LIV vs. PGA Latest, Big Picture + Early Open Bets
itunes:title: GoLow Golf - LIV vs. PGA Latest, Big Picture + Early Open Bets
description:
John discusses the recent developments in the LIV golf vs. PGA war,  and how it fits into the golf gambling landscape, and the early best bets for The Open with the Tour Junkies pod crew. 

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
